snippet: A letter of resignation written by a guard was cited as new evidence in the case of Charles Jason Toll, 33, who died while being forced out of his cell by corrections officers.
abstract: Federal Judge John T Nixon grants new civil trial in lawsuit over 2010 death of inmate Charles Jason Toll at prison in Nashville after he was forcibly extracted from cell by guards; decision is based on resignation letter written by William Amonette, guard present night that Toll died.
lead_paragraph: A letter of resignation written by a guard was cited as new evidence in the case of Charles Jason Toll, 33, who died while being forced out of his cell by corrections officers.

headline.main: Judge Cites Prison Guard’s Letter in Granting New Trial in Death of Nashville Inmate
headline.print_headline: Judge Cites Prison Guard’s Letter in Granting New Trial in Death of Nashville Inmate
